text: Vilkha on Kyiv Independence Day Parade, 2018 Vilkha ( , Olkha "Alder tree") is Ukrainian heavy multiple rocket launcher with guided ammunition. Developed by Luch Design Bureau. It is made on the basis of the BM-30 Smerch system. Vilkha has entered service in the Ukrainian armed forces in 2018. == See also == * Hrim-2 (missile system) * Neptune (cruise missile) ==Links== * * * * Category:Guided missiles of Ukraine
title: Vilkha (missile complex)
